title: Bed Bug Sends Philadelphia City Hall Workers Home
text: Subscribe Bed Bug Sends Philadelphia City Hall Workers Home Workers in Philadelphia City Hall's were sent home early one day last week after a bed bug was found where they work, NBC10 reported. September 18, 2015 PHILADELPHIA â€” Workers in Philadelphia City Hall's were sent home early on Thursday after a bed bug was found where they work, NBC10 is reporting . According to the news outlet, workers left City Hall at around 1 p.m. after a dead bedbug, a parasite that feeds off human blood, was found in the area where employees who handle the city's 311 calls work. It was first reported to be an infestation, but only one bug was found. Click here to read more.
